description: Try our easy to follow Mushroom Burger recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Burger,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Plant-based,Summer,Mushroom,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,High fibre,Vegetarian,Quick & easy lunch,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Mushroom Burger Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat a barbecue flat plate on high heat.

Brush field mushrooms with oil and season with salt and pepper. Place mushrooms and veggie patty on heated barbecue flat plate and cook for 5 minutes or until a nice colour has formed, then flip over and cook for a further 5 minutes. Set aside.
Combine kewpie mayo and char siu sauce. Combine cucumber, rice wine vinegar, pinch of salt and sugar. Season cabbage with salt.
Place patty on 1 of the cooked mushrooms. Assemble burger as desired with kewpie mixture cucumber, cabbage, onion and sprouts. Finish with remaining mushroom on top and serve.
